# ‚öîÔ∏è Crafted Items

### Custom Weapons üó°

Just for clarification, a "tier" in this context means a material tier.\
Wood/Gold = 0\
Stone = 1\
Iron = 2\
Diamond = 3\
Netherite = 4

#### **Great-Axes**

![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/35800803/318054922-828ced3e-56c7-4caf-a1d2-4c1e3d140133.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..H3RuWnbwmvcqLNiIkJJlfkdWvMtQKUqAAmXySGxt0Fs)

* _`+20%` Crit Chance_
* _`9.0` Base Attack Damage_ (+1.5/tier)
* _`0.5` Attack Speed_

#### **Warhammers**

![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/35800803/318055420-43fc7cfe-50fc-4423-8391-d56005ee6c88.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..5D1V8hKKaug88ZEvtAONM\_KTraksOApFO09UbPsVI60)

* _`+50%` Knockback_
* _`+20%` Stun Chance_
* _`1.0` Attack Damage_
* _`6.0` Base Bludgeoning Damage_ (+1/tier)
* _`1.0` Attack Speed_\


The 1 attack damage is currently required for the weapon to do damage at all, though it does mean the weapon type essentially has a base damage of 7 and not 6.

#### **Spears**

![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/35800803/318055480-26f51997-b88a-425a-8786-43423d2aa9f4.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..3YczSZDpJA\_x1AVfUwchrngoDZW0OIk1KZEJTbfr8ig)

* _`+1.0` Attack Reach_
* _`+30%` Velocity Damage_
* _`5.0` Base Attack Damage_ (+1/tier)
* _`0.8` Attack Speed_

Velocity damage makes you deal more damage the faster you approach the target. For +30% Velocity damage, you deal approximately 30% more damage if you approach the target at sprint-jumping speed.

#### **Morningstars**

Used to be called maces, but then Minecraft added The Mace, so my maces are renamed to morningstars

![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/35800803/318055583-7bf488bb-2579-47f3-aa4b-94f690d8b4be.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..EpGflZ7dJmM4rbRE3V2smc9bEyFXXbpgpjFnvQMGWtU)

* _`+20%` Stun Chance_
* _`1.0` Attack Damage_
* _`2.5` Base Bludgeoning Damage_ (+1/tier)
* _`1.6` Attack Speed_

The 1 attack damage is currently required for the weapon to do damage at all, though it does mean the weapon type essentially has a base damage of 3.5 and not 2.5.

#### **Rapiers**

![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/35800803/318055643-11fd5f9f-db4e-45e3-af4c-4233dbca16f9.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..Bo6nPYwAa2-4lkIvX1zJKm9EHLsR8feqqoz59aIKu1Y)

* _`+30%` Armor Penetration_
* _`+50%` Immunity Reduction_
* _`-200%` Knockback_
* _`2.0` Base Attack Damage_ (+0.5/tier)
* _`4.0` Attack Speed_

#### **Daggers**

![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/35800803/318055694-3dd91d09-c541-49c5-b902-df530feb2a62.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..NIh1NwLD70Pnh0FmcAKdfnrSIm9g\_Tr84t1v-7163I0)

* _`+20%` Crit Chance_
* _`-1.0` Attack Reach_
* _`4.0` Base Attack Damage_ (+1/tier)
* _`1.8` Attack Speed_

### Other Recipes üç∞

#### üî± **Trident** (Requires Marine Smithing (smithing) unlocked)

![](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/35800803/318061876-a877cdcf-e551-4052-9c13-a7bb76d6dd06.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..NH4AXVuSEvevHeIpSZ9kZMZmGAA-PFN2ek3AX0Lxfa4)

#### üïä **Elytra** (Requires Exotic Smithing (smithing) unlocked)

![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/35800803/318062219-2c10e733-f839-4c86-b705-3ee8c433f211.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..Q2mZjU1iBTU2mW44OKLNqzExIIrkNzV5kHizT1V7D8Q) ![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/35800803/318062404-94b6fd85-fa79-4a15-8ff4-20da394282d6.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..rpSMJn2mmeB2wry5B0qKVq68SDP0NlDUCwTNnzRDYXI)

#### üß™ **Vials** (Requires Etching Venom (alchemy) unlocked)

**Glass Vial**\
![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/35800803/318065483-93450f9f-ef91-43ae-83fd-5aa8531d4275.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..wj-kPBYGytDqhFqcVNd3Vu8RrfMC6CURzSwG6BlQSJM)\
The base component in the other vial recipes

**Vial 'o' Rot**\
![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/35800803/318065922-d146fbe1-5925-4c27-b2a9-6b305b536403.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..i6zgmBKoCw7XU6U2VT1\_u4WGZ\_O3H6Sh7zUWaZr3R34)\
Can be thrown or applied to weapons to apply `50%` healing reduction

**Vial 'o' Poison**\
![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/35800803/318066120-575a8dce-f22a-4ea5-b594-db675f5423e6.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..41eDlWPr9SDnh8Af-fcCki9UmlO5STiR4i\_Jt4yzJpE)\
Can be thrown or applied to weapons to apply `Poison I (0:30)`

**Vial 'o' Holiness**\
![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/35800803/318066355-6844419d-c7d9-417a-a460-ba4a4ab91a85.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..T6PT-4tdVieQKKuENxaTlRBpN2Ou4ywCdLy83pfOW9Y)\
Can be thrown or applied to weapons to apply `6.0` Instant Radiant damage

**Vial 'o' Hurt**\
![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/35800803/318066823-1f3f15d7-d60e-4913-bc4b-86d8acab559d.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..LmI-ljOGTKazq8ussLDhPKf66g80fbICZdX7M\_JsEek)\
Can be thrown or applied to weapons to apply `4.0` Instant Magic damage

**Mushroom Block**

Nine red mushrooms can be crafted into one red mushroom block. Also works with brown mushrooms.

&#x20;![](<../../../.gitbook/assets/image (1).png>)

**Crying Obsidian**

4 ender pearls and 1 obsidian crafts 1 crying obsidian.

&#x20;![](<../../../.gitbook/assets/image (2).png>)

**Horse Armor**

You can craft Iron, Gold, or Diamond horse armor by putting 7 of the respective resource into a crafting table in an H shape.

**Wither Rose**

Eight blocks of coal and a rose bush in the middle crafts five wither roses. ![](<../../../.gitbook/assets/image (4).png>)

**Heart of the Sea**

Four lapis lazuli, four prismarine shards, and a nether star crafts a Heart of the Sea. ![](<../../../.gitbook/assets/image (5).png>)

**Enchanted Golden Apple**

Four magma cream, four golden blocks, and one golden apple crafts an enchanted golden apple.

&#x20;![](<../../../.gitbook/assets/image (6).png>)

**Chainmail**

Chains can now be used to craft chainmail. You need 5, 8, 7, and 4 chains to craft a full set, which is the same as any other armor set.

&#x20;![](<../../../.gitbook/assets/image (7).png>)

**Saddle**

Three leather and three iron is required for a saddle's crafting recipe. ![](<../../../.gitbook/assets/image (8).png>)

**Bell**

Three sticks, one gold block, one gold nugget, and four stone blocks can make the bell item. ![](<../../../.gitbook/assets/image (9).png>)



\
